RtangentXY 1.0.0
  • Reference

RtangentXY: TangentXY SCNA Signal Normalization

RtangentXY-package.Rd

This is the package implementation of TangentXY, a sex-informed copy number inference algorithm which extends Tangent, as published in 2022 (PMID: 36040167).

See also

Useful links:

  • https://beroukhim-lab.github.io/RtangentXY/
